video.title: Dexter
video.synopsis: By day, mild-mannered Dexter is a blood-splatter analyst for the Miami police. But at night, he is a serial killer who only targets other murderers.

episodes.synopsis: Dexter Morgan, a forensics expert who leads a secret life as a killer of unconvicted criminals, is impressed by the work of a new serial killer.
episodes.title: Dexter

episodes.synopsis: After targeting a businessman about to be acquitted of murder, Dexter learns that the Ice Truck Killer knows about his double life.
episodes.title: Crocodile

episodes.synopsis: When the body of another Ice Truck Killer victim turns up at a hockey rink, Lt. Laguerta has the department focused on capturing a night watchman.
episodes.title: Popping Cherry

episodes.synopsis: Body parts from the Ice Truck Killer's latest victim begin appearing all over Miami in locations Dexter realizes are related to his own childhood.
episodes.title: Let's Give The Boy A Hand

episodes.synopsis: The police department catches a big break in its investigation of the Ice Truck Killer when one victim is found alive.
episodes.title: Love American Style

episodes.synopsis: When the body of one of Dexter's victims is returned to the original crime scene, Dexter suspects the Ice Truck Killer is responsible.
episodes.title: Return To Sender

episodes.synopsis: The police think they've uncovered the identity of the Ice Truck Killer, but Dexter is not sure they're right.
episodes.title: Circle Of Friends

episodes.synopsis: Several wealthy women have apparently died of suicide, but Dexter suspects they were really murdered by their psychologist.
episodes.title: Shrink Wrap

episodes.synopsis: Dexter travels to the house of his biological father, who just passed away, to rekindle forgotten memories.
episodes.title: Father Knows Best

episodes.synopsis: When Dexter is sent to investigate a bloody crime scene, deeply suppressed memories from his childhood begin to resurface.
episodes.title: Seeing Red

episodes.synopsis: Just days before Christmas, the Ice Truck Killer leaves the body of a dead prostitute outside Santa's Cottage.
episodes.title: Truth Be Told

episodes.synopsis: While avoiding the misguided Sgt. Doakes, Dexter searches for the real Ice Truck Killer and his hostage before it's too late.
episodes.title: Born Free

episodes.synopsis: As a cool forensics expert with killer instincts, Dexter's got it made -- but he may be getting more recognition than he ever hoped for.
episodes.title: It's Alive

episodes.synopsis: A still-shaken Dexter continues stalking the monstrous Little Chino, while Debra struggles with her lingering demons.
episodes.title: Waiting To Exhale

episodes.synopsis: Dexter's mysterious late-night activities attract the wrong kind of attention from Rita, who's convinced his vice of choice must be drugs.
episodes.title: An Inconvenient Lie

episodes.synopsis: To appease Rita, Dex gets a drug sponsor -- who proves too attractive for Rita's comfort. Meanwhile, he tries shaking off the tenacious Lundy.
episodes.title: See-Through

episodes.synopsis: Dexter isn't an easy man to shock, but he gets the surprise of his life when he learns that his mother's murderer is alive and in Florida.
episodes.title: The Dark Defender

episodes.synopsis: Inspired by the work of the Bay Harbor Butcher, a copycat vigilante has started dishing out his brand of harsh justice, and Dexter isn't happy.
episodes.title: Dex, Lies and Videotape

episodes.synopsis: Dexter comes up with a near-perfect strategy to throw Lundy off the track, concocting a rambling "Bay Harbor Butcher Manifesto."
episodes.title: That Night, A Forest Grew

episodes.synopsis: Lila's growing attachment is enough to put Dexter off the recovery process, and he decides it's time to again confront the man who killed his mother.
episodes.title: Morning Comes

episodes.synopsis: Lila's fatal attraction for Dexter is about to boil over, but he already has his hands full trying to stay one up on his sister and Lundy.
episodes.title: Resistance Is Futile

episodes.synopsis: Dexter turns the tables on Doakes, but the triumph is short-lived when Doakes reveals a secret that shakes Dex's foundations.
episodes.title: There's Something About Harry

episodes.synopsis: Dexter faces a dilemma with Doakes, a man with information that could tear Dex's world apart but who doesn't fit the profile of his usual victims.
episodes.title: Left Turn Ahead

episodes.synopsis: Just as Dexter resolves one major problem in his life, another threatens to spiral out of control when Lila refuses to move on.
episodes.title: The British Invasion

episodes.synopsis: Dexter's life seems to be back on track, until he targets a dope dealer who is also in the sights of Assistant D.A. Miguel Prado.
episodes.title: Our Father

episodes.synopsis: Every cop in Miami is tasked with finding the fugitive Freebo, who is accused of killing the younger brother of Assistant D.A. Miguel Prado.
episodes.title: Finding Freebo

episodes.synopsis: Dexter encounters a fellow predator, but this one is a pedophile; a murder is pinned on Freebo but Dexter knows the truth.
episodes.title: The Lion Sleeps Tonight

episodes.synopsis: Dexter scrambles to convince Rita that his marriage proposal is sincere and romantic.
episodes.title: All In The Family

episodes.synopsis: Dexter hears the story of a husband who has gotten away with murdering two wives for financial gain and tracks the man to Bimini.
episodes.title: Turning Biminese

episodes.synopsis: Dexter tests Miguel to determine if his friend has discovered his secret, while Rita loses her job.
episodes.title: Si Se Puede

episodes.synopsis: Dexter begins working with Miguel but they quickly have differences in selecting a potential new victim.
episodes.title: Easy As Pie

episodes.synopsis: Dexter undertakes to teach Miguel the Code but doesn't realize he's whetting his partner's thirst for blood.
episodes.title: The Damage A Man Can Do

episodes.synopsis: The friendship between Dexter and Miguel becomes strained even as Rita resolves to confront Miguel about his suspected infidelity.
episodes.title: About Last Night

episodes.synopsis: A series of chess-like moves ensues when Dexter and Miguel vie for the upper hand, with Miguel winning Rita's affection.
episodes.title: Go Your Own Way

episodes.synopsis: Dexter must find a way to get rid of Miguel despite the fact that his friend is a highly placed D.A. (and Dexter's best man).
episodes.title: I Had A Dream

episodes.synopsis: Dexter attempts to calm the emotionally unstable Ramon now that Miguel is out of the picture.
episodes.title: Do You Take Dexter Morgan?

episodes.synopsis: Now with a wife and kids in tow, America's favorite serial killer has more to lose than ever as he gets drawn into a deadly game.
episodes.title: Living The Dream

episodes.synopsis: While helping Agent Lundy investigate new slayings he insists are Trinity's, Dexter realizes he's misplaced crucial evidence that could expose him.
episodes.title: Remains To Be Seen

episodes.synopsis: Dexter is hampered by his neighborhood's increased vigilance, his temporary inability to drive and his admiration for the artful Trinity Killer.
episodes.title: Blinded By The Light

episodes.synopsis: With Rita and the kids away, Dexter begins stalking his next victim, until he starts to empathize with his target, a cop who murdered her family.
episodes.title: Dex Takes A Holiday

episodes.synopsis: Dexter is inspired to investigate the Trinity Killer on his own. Rita realizes how little she knows her husband after discovering one of his secrets.
episodes.title: Dirty Harry

episodes.synopsis: Dexter redoubles his efforts to stay ahead of the official Trinity investigation and gets relationship advice about Rita from an unexpected source.
episodes.title: If I Had A Hammer

episodes.synopsis: Dexter is finally comfortable with his life, but is thwarted in his pursuit of a new victim. Debra has a renewed interest in their father's dark past.
episodes.title: Slack Tide

episodes.synopsis: Wondering if his father's Code is right, Dexter goes on a road trip with Trinity. Debra realizes her pursuit of Trinity has blinded her to the truth.
episodes.title: Road Kill

episodes.synopsis: Dexter learns more about Arthur's twisted world. As Rita prepares a big Thanksgiving dinner, Debra uses the holiday to further investigate Trinity.
episodes.title: Hungry Man

episodes.synopsis: The disappearance of a 10-year-old boy forces Dexter to question his assumptions about Trinity; Masuka cannot face what he witnessed on Thanksgiving.
episodes.title: Lost Boys

episodes.synopsis: Dexter buys time as Debra's investigation is one step away from naming Arthur as the Trinity Killer; Rita is disappointed after confiding in Dexter.
episodes.title: Hello, Dexter Morgan

episodes.synopsis: Dexter and Arthur are on a collision course, while Debra unearths a shocking, long-hidden truth, and Rita admits her marriage to Dexter is troubled.
episodes.title: The Getaway

episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of a traumatic incident, Dexter makes a choice that will affect everyone. Meanwhile, Quinn has his suspicions about Dexter.
episodes.title: My Bad

episodes.synopsis: Dexter tries to focus his energy on his kids and fight his dark urges, but a shocking discovery puts him on the trail of a new victim.
episodes.title: Hello, Bandit

episodes.synopsis: To create more free time to stalk and kill victims, Dexter hires a nanny. Meanwhile, Debra is annoyed by her new rookie partner.
episodes.title: Practically Perfect

episodes.synopsis: Dexter finds himself in an odd situation when he has to save a life instead of taking one, and Debra has a scary confrontation with a murder suspect.
episodes.title: Beauty and the Beast

episodes.synopsis: When Dexter is saddled with an unwanted conspirator, he has to make hard decisions about her fate. Meanwhile, Debra works the Santa Muerte case alone.
episodes.title: First Blood

episodes.synopsis: Dexter hunts a new target but gets distracted and drawn into a precarious situation while helping his troubled new acquaintance.
episodes.title: Everything is Illumenated

episodes.synopsis: While helping Lumen, Dexter finds himself on a collision course with the homicide team when he's called to investigate a horrifying crime scene.
episodes.title: Circle Us

episodes.synopsis: While attending a self-help seminar, Dexter and Lumen stalk a violent killer. Elsewhere, fallout from the Santa Muerte case lands Debra in trouble.
episodes.title: Take It!

episodes.synopsis: While in the midst of hunting down their next victim, Dexter and Lumen are distracted by the return of an unannounced guest.
episodes.title: Teenage Wasteland

episodes.synopsis: Dexter finds a possible ally in the pursuit of Lumen's former captors. Meanwhile, Debra identifies two more suspects in the Barrel Girls case.
episodes.title: In the Beginning

episodes.synopsis: Dexter is forced to do damage control after conceding that someone outside of Miami Metro has taken an interest in him and Lumen.
episodes.title: Hop a Freighter

episodes.synopsis: Dexter realizes that he and Lumen are being lured into a trap and risks everything to escape. Meanwhile, Quinn needs help that only Dexter can supply.
episodes.title: The Big One

episodes.synopsis: Homicide's investigation into a gruesome, faith-based murder causes Dexter to ask some spiritual questions and consider his son's legacy.
episodes.title: Those Kinds of Things

episodes.synopsis: To solve a mysterious and macabre murder, Homicide brings in Brother Sam, a minister with a criminal past whom Dexter recognizes as a fellow killer.
episodes.title: Once Upon a Time...

episodes.synopsis: Dexter is confronted with a sobering glimpse of his own potential future when a serial killer from his past makes a startling reappearance.
episodes.title: Smokey and the Bandit

episodes.synopsis: Much to his own surprise, an emergency with Harrison and a new tableau from Gellar and Travis has Dexter leaning on Brother Sam for support.
episodes.title: A Horse of a Different Color

episodes.synopsis: With the help of his newfound friend Brother Sam, Dexter wonders if there is light within him to counter the darkness.
episodes.title: The Angel of Death

episodes.synopsis: Dexter is caught up in a very personal case that awakens the needs of his Dark Passenger.
episodes.title: Just Let Go

episodes.synopsis: Dexter finds himself teamed up with a fellow Dark Passenger when he takes a road trip to Nebraska to tie up some loose ends from the past.
episodes.title: Nebraska

episodes.synopsis: Dexter uses lessons he learned from Brother Sam to follow up on some new leads in the Doomsday investigation.
episodes.title: Sin of Omission

episodes.synopsis: Dexter receives help from an unexpected source while hunting the Doomsday Killers and staying one step ahead of Homicide.
episodes.title: Get Gellar

episodes.synopsis: Dexter tries to figure out the Doomsday Killers' next victim before it's too late; Debra has a strong reaction to a crime scene.
episodes.title: Ricochet Rabbit

episodes.synopsis: Dexter finds that in order to catch the Doomsday Killers, he must create a macabre tableau of his own.
episodes.title: Talk to the Hand

episodes.synopsis: Dexter and Homicide race against a lunar eclipse to catch the Doomsday Killers before their final gruesome act.
episodes.title: This is the Way the World Ends

episodes.synopsis: After Debra witnesses Dexter killing Travis Marshall, brother and sister attempt to reconcile and cover up their involvement with the murder.
episodes.title: Are You…?

episodes.synopsis: When a local convict claims he has new information regarding a 15-year-old crime spree, Miami Metro sets out to unearth new evidence on the case.
episodes.title: Sunshine & Frosty Swirl

episodes.synopsis: Dexter tries to bring Debra on-board with his new target, while the Ukrainian mob seeks revenge for the killing of one of their own.
episodes.title: Buck The System

episodes.synopsis: After capturing a deadly killer, things go awry for Miami Metro, sending Debra into a tailspin. Dexter enters into a dangerous game of cat and mouse.
episodes.title: Run

episodes.synopsis: While trying to uncover why Louis was killed on his boat, Dexter must out-maneuver Isaak, who's after Dexter -- and Debra.
episodes.title: Swim Deep

episodes.synopsis: Dexter becomes more intrigued by Hannah, while Debra gets to know a local crime writer who has dug up some possibly incriminating dirt on Hannah.
episodes.title: Do the Wrong Thing

episodes.synopsis: Things heat up as Dexter and Hannah grow closer, and when Sal Price discovers the two are involved, he wants the exclusive story.
episodes.title: Chemistry

episodes.synopsis: Dexter tries to keep Debra in the dark about his relationship with Hannah, but a surprise visit from Astor, Cody and Harrison derails his plans.
episodes.title: Argentina

episodes.synopsis: Dexter is preoccupied with Isaak still on the loose, but an internal struggle within the Koshka Brotherhood could work to Dexter's advantage.
episodes.title: Helter Skelter

episodes.synopsis: A surprise visit from Hannah's father puts Dexter on alert, and the Phantom Arsonist's crimes become more gruesome.
episodes.title: The Dark… Whatever

episodes.synopsis: When Dexter learns that the man who ordered his mother's death has been released from prison, he zeros in for a kill that might end all kills.
episodes.title: Do You See What I See?

episodes.synopsis: As LaGuerta closes in on Dexter's secret, Dexter struggles to protect himself, Debra and the life he's built.
episodes.title: Surprise, Motherf**ker!

episodes.synopsis: Dexter is still managing life as a dad, brother and killer, as Miami Metro investigates the murder of a man who's had pieces of his brain removed.
episodes.title: A Beautiful Day

episodes.synopsis: Miami Metro continues hunting for the Brain Surgeon, while Dr. Vogel enlists Dexter's help. While on a case, Debra takes matters into her own hands.
episodes.title: Every Silver Lining...

episodes.synopsis: Dexter continues his manhunt for the Brain Surgeon. Dr. Vogel tries to prove to Dexter that he's perfect as a psychopath. Debra's PTSD kicks in.
episodes.title: What's Eating Dexter Morgan?

episodes.synopsis: Dexter tracks down another potential killer from Dr. Vogel's list. Quinn celebrates passing the sergeant's exam by defending Debra's honor in a fight.
episodes.title: Scar Tissue

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Vogel comes into contact with the Brain Surgeon, while Dexter and Debra try to keep her safe. Masuka finds out he has a daughter.
episodes.title: This Little Piggy

episodes.synopsis: Dexter monitors a young psychopath. Dexter and Debra finally get back to normal, but are surprised when someone from Dexter's past pays them a visit.
episodes.title: A Little Reflection

episodes.synopsis: Dexter takes on a protégé and starts teaching him the Code.
episodes.title: Dress Code

episodes.synopsis: Dexter tracks down Zach, concerned that he may have murdered an innocent person. Meanwhile, Dexter tries to help Hannah escape the country.
episodes.title: Are We There Yet?

episodes.synopsis: Dexter investigates a murder that hits close to home. Dr. Vogel gets the surprise of a lifetime when someone returns from her past.
episodes.title: Make Your Own Kind of Music

episodes.synopsis: With Dr. Vogel's help, Dexter tries to lure the Brain Surgeon into a trap so he can get him on his table. Dexter witnesses a murder.
episodes.title: Goodbye Miami

episodes.synopsis: Dexter is torn between fleeing the country or taking out the Brain Surgeon.
episodes.title: Monkey in a Box

episodes.synopsis: Series finale. Dexter is faced with impossible odds as a brewing hurricane makes its way towards Miami.
episodes.title: Remember the Monsters?
